statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Your task is to Calculate a + b.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Input contains multiple test cases. Each test case contains a pair of integers a and b, one pair of integers per line. A test case containing 0 0 terminates the input and this test case is not to be processed.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each pair of input integers a and b you should output the sum of a and b in one line, and with one line of output for each line in input.
